title: Border, "Scrolling polychrome passion flower floral garlands", ca. 1830
creditline: Museum purchase from the Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program, General Acquisitions Endowment, Eleanor G. Hewitt, and Pauline Cooper Noyes Funds
description: Scrolling floral vine with passion flower and morning glory on satin cream ground with gray and green bands at either edge. Printed three borders across the width.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, "Scrolling polychrome passion flower floral garlands", ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Block-printed on continuous paper. Museum purchase from the Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program, General Acquisitions Endowment, Eleanor G. Hewitt, and Pauline Cooper Noyes Funds. 1994-101-5-a,b.
